TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventArrivedEventArgs extends System.Management.ManagementEventArgs

summary.span: 保存 事件的事件数据。

span.span: Holds event data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面的异步示例设置 WMI 计时器以每秒引发一个事件，并将其不再需要时删除。The following asynchronous example sets up a WMI timer to raise an event every second, and removes it when no longer needed. 定义了几个[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]WMI 事件传送时引发的事件。The defines several [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] events which are raised when WMI events are delivered. 委托被附加到这些事件，以处理传入的数据。Delegates are attached to these events for handling the incoming data. [!code-csharp[wminet_EventArrivedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_EventArrivedEventArgs/cs/EventArrivedEventArgs.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_EventArrivedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_EventArrivedEventArgs/vb/EventArrivedEventArgs.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NewEvent As ManagementBaseObject
public: property System::Management::ManagementBaseObject ^ NewEvent { System::Management::ManagementBaseObject ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取上次传递的 WMI 事件。

span.span: Gets the WMI event that was delivered.

value.span: 返回 ，它包含已传递的 WMI 事件。

span.span: Returns a that contains the delivered WMI event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value 表示 WMI 事件的对象。The object representing the WMI event. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
